front.title: A Profile for Resource Certificate Repository Structure

abstract.t: This document defines a profile for the structure of repositoriesthat contain X.509 / PKIX Resource Certificates, CertificateRevocation Lists and signed objects. This profile contains theproposed object naming scheme, the contents of repository publicationpoints, the contents of publication point manifests and a possibleinternal structure of a Repository Cache that is intended tofacilitate synchronization across a distributed collection ofrepositories and facilitate certificate path construction.
